name: Heart to heart (Grimoire Games, PortlyMoney4024, Kinckich, ElXavi, Tboxfinn)
name_original: Heart to heart (Grimoire Games, PortlyMoney4024, Kinckich, ElXavi, Tboxfinn)
description:
She was a small town girl, living in dreams. Alone, with no one, she decides to leave town, to embark on a journey towards adventure.

 He was a boy born in South Detroit, a city boy. Both some strangers who would join their paths and their lives.

Heart to Heart.

It is a puzzle game where you have to guide the protagonists, Max the girl from a small town and Todd the boy from the city, to complete their journey and end up meeting each other. You are the hand of destiny that helps things happen.
